name: spo-recyclebin-items-to-csv
title: Get SharePoint Site Recycle Bin Items And Export It To CSV
shortDescription: This script sample shows how to get recycle bin items from SharePoint site and export it to CSV
longDescription: This sample read site url from user and also read recycle bin stage value from user and then export it to CSV

references.name: Want to learn more about PnP PowerShell and the cmdlets
references.description: Check out the PnP PowerShell site to get started and for the reference to the cmdlets.
